{{VO/Story
|character           = Rosaria

|name                = 로자리아

|vo_01_01_title      = 첫 만남…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 가여운 신도여, 골칫거리가 있다면 날 찾아와. 근데 기도가 하고 싶은 거라면, 다른 수녀를 찾아가 봐.<br />…응? 넌 신도가 아니라고?
|vo_01_01_rm         = Gayeoun sindoyeo, golchitgeoriga itdamyeon nal chajawa. Geunde gidoga hago sipeun georamyeon, dareun sunyeoreul chajaga bwa.<br />...Eung? Neon sindoga anirago?
|vo_01_01_tl         = If you're in trouble, poor disciple, come and find me. But if you want to pray, go find another nun.<br />...Huh? You're not a disciple?

|vo_02_01_title      = 잡담・무료함
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Boredom
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Boredom.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = 아직 안 갔어?
|vo_02_01_rm         = Ajik an gasseo?
|vo_02_01_tl         = You still didn't leave?

|vo_02_02_title      = 잡담・잔업
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Overtime
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Overtime.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 뭐든 말 해봐. 잔업은 빼고
|vo_02_02_rm         = Mwodeun mal haebwa. Janeobeun ppaego
|vo_02_02_tl         = Say anything. Except for overtime.

|vo_02_03_title      = 잡담・몬드 생활
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Life in Mondstadt
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Life in Mondstadt.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 열심히 일해서 하루하루 잘 사는 게 몬드의 생활이잖아?
|vo_02_03_rm         = Yeolsimhi ilhaeseo haruharu jal saneun ge Mondeu-ui saenghwarijana?
|vo_02_03_tl         = Mondstadt's life is to work hard and live well every day, right?

|vo_03_01_title      = 비가 올 때…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 효율만 떨어져
|vo_03_01_rm         = Hyoyulman tteoreojyeo
|vo_03_01_tl         = It's just less efficient.

|vo_03_02_title      = 번개가 칠 때…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 하, 귀찮군
|vo_03_02_rm         = Ha, gwichankun
|vo_03_02_tl         = Ha, how troublesome.

|vo_03_03_title      = 눈이 올 때…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 눈 오는 날엔 조심히 움직이는 게 좋아
|vo_03_03_rm         = Nun oneul naren josimhi unjigineun ge joa
|vo_03_03_tl         = It's better to move carefully on snowy days.

|vo_03_04_title      = 강풍이 불 때…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = 바람의 신 바르스토바의 가호인가? 잠깐, 바르토바스였나…
|vo_03_04_rm         = Baram-ui Sin Bareuseutoba-ui gahoinga? Jamkkan, Bareutobaseuyeotna...
|vo_03_04_tl         = Blessings from the Anemo Archon Barsibato? Wait, was it Bartobas...

|vo_04_01_title      = 아침 인사…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = 좋은 아침, 하암… 벌써 아침 기도가 시작된 거야? 너무 이르잖아
|vo_04_01_rm         = Joeun achim, ha'am... beolsseo achim gidoga sijakdoen geoya? Neomu ireujana
|vo_04_01_tl         = Good morning, yawn... Morning prayers have already begun? It's too early.

|vo_04_02_title      = 점심 인사…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 오후의 햇살은 숙면에 좋대. 너도 한번 느껴봐
|vo_04_02_rm         = Ohu-ui haetsareun sukmyeone jotdae. Neodo hanbeon neukkyeobwa
|vo_04_02_tl         = The afternoon sun is good for a good night's sleep. You should feel it too.

|vo_04_03_title      = 저녁 인사…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = 저녁이네. 저녁 기도라면 난 빠질래. 이유는 없어
|vo_04_03_rm         = Jeonyeogine. Jeonyeok gidoramyeon na ppajillae. Iyuneun eopsseo
|vo_04_03_tl         = It's evening. If it's evening prayers, I'm out. No reason.

|vo_04_04_title      = 굿나잇…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = 가서 쉬어. 나머지 일은 내가 처리할 테니 안심해
|vo_04_04_rm         = Gaseo swieo. Nameoji ireun naega cheorihal teni ansimhae
|vo_04_04_tl         = Go get some rest. No need to worry about the rest, I'll take care of them.

|vo_05_01_title      = 로자리아 자신에 대해・수녀
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}: Sister
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Sister.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 나? 난 그냥 재미없는 사람이야. 보다시피 성당도, 일하는 것도 싫어하지
|vo_05_01_rm         = Na? Nan geunyang jaemieomneun saramiya. Bodasipi seongdangdo, ilhaneun geotdo sireohaji
|vo_05_01_tl         = Me? I'm just a boring person. You see, I don't like the church, I don't like working.

|vo_05_02_title      = 로자리아 자신에 대해・귀찮음
|vo_05_02_subtitle   = About {character}: Troubles
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Troubles.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx         = 그 수녀들 정말 귀찮아 죽겠다니까. 사람 잡아두고 기도해라, 찬양해라. 나 여기 있다는 거 절대 말하지 마
|vo_05_02_rm         = Geu sunyeodeul jeongmal gwichana jukgetdanikka. Saram jabadugo gidohaera, chanyanghaera. Nan yeogi itdaneun geo jeoldae malhaji ma
|vo_05_02_tl         = The nuns are so annoying. Telling someone to pray and praise. Don't ever tell me I'm here.

|vo_06_01_title      = 우리에 대해・신앙
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Beliefs
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Beliefs.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 신이 모든 인간을 포용할 수 있다지만 다 돌봐주진 않을걸? 안 그럼 인간의 고난이 무의미해질 거 아냐
|vo_06_01_rm         = Sini modeun inganeul poyonghal su itdajiman da dolbwajujin anneulgeol? An geureom ingan-ui gonani mu'uimihaejil geo anya
|vo_06_01_tl         = God says he can embrace all human beings, but he won't take care of them, you know? Otherwise, human suffering will be meaningless.

|vo_06_02_title      = 우리에 대해・기도
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Prayer
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Prayer.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 기도하자. 신이나 다른 사람을 위해서가 아닌 자신을 위해서 말이야
|vo_06_02_rm         = Gidohaja. Sinina dareun sarameul wihaeseoga anin jasineul wihaeseo mariya
|vo_06_02_tl         = Let's pray for ourselves, not for God or anyone else.

|vo_06_03_title      = 우리에 대해・전투
|vo_06_03_subtitle   = About Us: Battle
|vo_06_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Battle.ogg
|vo_06_03_tx         = 무리하지 말고 도움이 필요하면 날 불러
|vo_06_03_rm         = Murihaji malgo doumi piryohamyeon nal bulleo
|vo_06_03_tl         = Don't overexert, if you need any help, call me.

|vo_07_01_title      = 「신의 눈」에 대해…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the Vision
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 「신의 눈」은 실력의 증명이자 살아남았다는 훈장이기도 해…. 글쎄? 좋은 건 항상 양면성이 있기 마련이지. 「신의 눈」이 뭔지 단정 짓지 않을 거야. 나와는 서로를 증명하는 관계일 뿐이니까
|vo_07_01_rm         = "Sin-ui Nun"eun sillyeok-ui jeungmyeong'ija saranamatdaneun hunjang'igido hae.... Geulsse? Joeun geon hangsang yangmyeonseong'i itgi maryeoniji. "Sin-ui Nun"i mwonji danjeongjitji aneul geoya. Nawan seorureul jeungmyeonghaneun gwangyeil ppuninikka
|vo_07_01_tl         = A "Vision" is a testament to his ability and a medal for survival... Well, good things always have two sides. I'm not going to conclude what a "Vision" is. We're just proving each other.

|vo_07_02_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기…
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 기분 좋아지는 얘기… 아, 만일일 뿐이지만 언젠가 해결할 수 없는 난관에 부딪히게 돼도 그게 인생의 끝이라고 생각하지 마. 누군가 널 그 곤경에서 꺼내줄지도 모르잖아?
|vo_07_02_rm         = Gibun joajineun yaegi... a, maninil ppunijiman eonjenga haegyeolhal su eomneun nangwane budichige dwaedo geuge insaeng-ui kkeuchirago saenggakhaji ma. Nugunga neol geu gongyeong'eseo kkeonaejuljido moreujana?
|vo_07_02_tl         = A story that makes someone feel good... Oh, don't think it's the end of your life if you encounter a difficulty that you can't solve someday. Someone might get you out of that mess, right?

|vo_07_03_title      = 흥미있는 일…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 풀떼기 같은 거엔 관심 없어. 아, 민들레만 빼고. 아주 맛있는 민들레주를 만들 수 있거든. 휴식 시간에 마시는 한잔은 늦잠보다 달콤하지
|vo_07_03_rm         = Pulttegi gateun geoen gwansim eopsseo. A, mindeulleman ppaego. Aju masitneun mindeullejureul mandeul su itgeodeun. Hyusik sigane masineun hanjaneun neutjamboda dalkomhaji
|vo_07_03_tl         = I'm not interested in grass. Oh, except for dandelions. Those can be made to delicious dandelion wine. A glass during a break is sweeter than a late sleep.

|vo_08_01_title      = 다이루크에 대해…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Diluc]]
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diluc.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 딱 보면 알잖아? 그 부잣집 도련님은 보통 내기가 아니야. 자신을 드러내지 않고, 자신감 넘치면서… 위험한 기운이 맴돌지
|vo_08_01_rm         = Ttak bomyeon aljana? Geu bujatjip doryeonnimeun botong naegiga aniya. Jasineul deureonaeji anko, jasingam neomchimyeonseo... wiheomhan giuni maemdolji
|vo_08_01_tl         = You know when you see it, right? The young rich mister is no ordinary person. He doesn't show himself, he's full of confidence... and there's a sense of danger around him.

|vo_08_02_title      = 케이아에 대해…
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Kaeya]]
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kaeya.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 케이아는 술에 취해야만 본 모습이 드러나. 말만 번지르르한 건 그의 보호색인 셈이지. 하, 아무리 연기해도 다 보여. 너도 그가 취한 모습을 한번 봐야 해
|vo_08_02_rm         = Keia-neun sure chwihaeyaham bon mosseubi deureona. Malman beonjireureuhan geon geu-ui bohosaegin semiji. Ha, amuri yeongihaedo da boyeo. Neodo geuga chwihan moseubeul hanbeon bwaya hae
|vo_08_02_tl         = Kaeya's real self only shows when he's drunk. Him being a smooth talker is only his protective coloring. Ha, I can see everything no matter how much he acts. You should see him drunk, too.

|vo_08_03_title      = 벤티에 대해…
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Venti]]
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Venti.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 그 음유시인한텐 아주 특별한 기운이 있어…. 아직 단정 지을 순 없지만, 다른 시민들과는 뭔가 다른 것 같아
|vo_08_03_rm         = Geu eumyusi'inhanten aju teukbyeolhan giuni isseo.... Ajik danjeong jieul sun eopjjiman, dareun simindeulgwaneun mwonga dareun geot gata
|vo_08_03_tl         = That bard has a very special energy... I can't decide it yet, but I think he's different from other citizens.

|vo_08_04_title      = 바바라에 대해…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Barbara]]
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Barbara.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 바바라는 계속 내 옆에 붙어서 예배드리고 성가대에 서라고 안달이야. 설마 빅토리아가 보낸 건가?
|vo_08_04_rm         = Babara-neun gyesok nae yeope buteoseo yebaedeurigo seonggadae'e seorago andariya. Seolma Biktoria-ga bonaen geonga?
|vo_08_04_tl         = Barbara always sticks by me and says to attend religious services and stand in the choir. Perhaps Victoria sent her?

|vo_08_05_title      = 진에 대해…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Jean]]
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Jean.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 본인의 일 말고도 남의 뒤치다꺼리까지 하다니. 존경스러운 여자야
|vo_08_05_rm         = Bonin-ui il malgodo nam-ui dwichidakkeorikkaji hadani. Jongyeongseuroun yeojaya
|vo_08_05_tl         = She cleans up other people besides her own business. What a respectable woman.

|vo_08_06_title      = 알베도에 대해…
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Albedo]]
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Albedo.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 그는 마치 낡은 방에 걸려 있는 유화 그림 같아…. 무게감 있고, 신비롭고, 속을 들여다볼 수 없지. 사연 있는 사람을 싫어하진 않아
|vo_08_06_rm         = Geuneun machi nalgeun bang'e geollyeo itneun yuhwa geurim gata.... Mugegam itgo, sinbiropgo, sogeul deuryeodabol so eopjji. Sayeon itneun sarameul sireohajin ana
|vo_08_06_tl         = He's like an oil painting hung in an old room... Heavy, mysterious, and couldn't be looked inside. I don't hate people with stories.

|vo_08_07_title      = 리사에 대해…
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Lisa]]
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 근무 중에 게으름 피우는 사람은 싫어. 하지만 정시 퇴근하고 싶어하는 그녀의 마음은 이해가 돼
|vo_08_07_rm         = Geunmu jung'e ge'eureum piuneun sarameun sireo. Hajiman jeongsi toegeunhago sipeohaneun geunyeo-ui maeumeun ihaega dwae
|vo_08_07_tl         = I don't like lazy people on duty. But I understand how she wants to get off work on time.

|vo_08_08_title      = 클레에 대해…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Klee]]
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Klee.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 사건 사고를 몰고 다니는 아이야. 귀여운 사고뭉치긴 하지만
|vo_08_08_rm         = Sageon sagoreul mulgo danineun aiya. Gwiyeoun sagomungchigin hajiman
|vo_08_08_tl         = She's a kid with lots of accidents around. She's a cute troublemaker, though.

|vo_08_09_title      = 바르카에 대해…
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Varka]]
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = 좋은 뜻인 건 알지만, 영감처럼 잔소리가 심해. 그 녀석, 자기 사람들은 엄청 챙긴다니까
|vo_08_09_rm         = Joeun tteusin geon aljiman, yeonggamcheoreom jansoriga simhae. Geu nyeoseok, jagi saramdeureun eomcheong chaenggindanikka
|vo_08_09_tl         = I know he means well, but he nags like an old man. He takes care of his people a lot.

|vo_08_10_title      = 아버지에 대해…
|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About Her Father
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Her Father.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = 아버지? 정말 괴리감이 느껴지는 단어네. 나한텐 없다고 할 수도, 한 명이 아니라고 할 수도 있지. 음? 그렇게 놀랄 일인가?
|vo_08_10_rm         = Abeoji? Jeongmal goerigami neukkyeojineun daneone. Nahanten eopttago hal sudo, han myeong'i anirago hal sudo itji. Eum? Geureoke nollal iringa?
|vo_08_10_tl         = Father? That's a very distant word. You can say I don't have one, or you can say I don't only have one. Hmm? Is it that surprising?

|vo_09_01_title      = 로자리아에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 일하러 온 거니까 인사치레는 됐어. 감당 안 되는 문제는 나한테 넘겨
|vo_09_01_rm         = Ilhareo on geonikka insachireneun dwaesseo. Gamdang an doeneun munjeneun nahante neomgyeo
|vo_09_01_tl         = I'm here for work, so you don't have to say hello. Hand me the problems you can't handle.

|vo_09_02_title      = 로자리아에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 신을 안 믿는다고 이상한 수녀는 아니야. 세상엔 돼지고기를 싫어하는 사냥꾼, 생선을 싫어하는 어부도 있잖아? 좋아하는 것만 할 수도, 싫어하는 걸 안 할 수도 없는게 바로 일이지
|vo_09_02_rm         = Sineul an mitneundago isanghan sunyeoneun aniya. Sesang'en dwaejigogireul sireohaneun sanyangkkun, saengseoneul sireohaneun eobudo itjana? Joahaneun geotman hal sudo, sireohaneun geol an hal sudo eomneun ge baro iriji
|vo_09_02_tl         = Not believing in God doesn't mean I'm a weird nun. There are hunters who don't like pork, fishermen who don't like fish, right? You can't just do what you like or don't like, that's work.

|vo_09_03_title      = 로자리아에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 한잔할래? 이건 올해 만든 민들레주야. 맛이 아주 좋아
|vo_09_03_rm         = Hanjanhallae? Igeon olhae mandeun mindeullejuya. Masi aju joa
|vo_09_03_tl         = Do you want a drink? This is dandelion wine made this year. It tastes so good.

|vo_09_04_title      = 로자리아에 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 몬드는 오래됐지만 어린 하얀 야수야. 누군가 보호해 줘야 할 만큼 오래됐지만, 아직 어려서 홀로서기는 할 수 없지. 오직 이런 곳만이 날 필요로 해. 이곳에선 다른 수녀들이 시민을 보살피는 것처럼 나도 몬드를 자유롭고 평안하게 보살필 수 있거든. 왜 하얀색이냐고? …내가 검은색이니까
|vo_09_04_rm         = Mondeuneun oraedwaetjiman eorin hayan yasuya. Nugunga bohohae jwoya hal mankeum oraedwaetjiman, ajik eoryeoseo holloseogineun hal su eopjji. Ojik ireon gotmani nal piryoryo hae. Igoseseon dareun sunyeodeuri simineul bosalpineun geotcheoreom nado Mondeureul jayuropgo pyeong'anhage bosalpil su itgeodeun. Wae hayansaeginyago? ...Naega geomeunsaeginikka
|vo_09_04_tl         = Mondstadt is an old but young white beast. It's old enough for someone to protect, but it can't stand alone because it's still young. Only a place like here needs me. I can take care of Mondstadt freely and peacefully, just as other nuns take care of their citizens here. Why is it white? ...Because I'm the black.

|vo_09_05_title      = 로자리아에 대해 알기・ 다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 난 가끔 지난날들의 내가 존재하고 있음을 느껴…. 또 나 자신에게 기대해왔다는 것도… 너도 이런 느낌을 받은 적이 있을 거야. 그러니까 오늘날의 네가 전혀 다른 길을 가고 있더라도 절대 과거의 자신을 부정하지 마. 예전의 네가 오늘의 널 만든 거니까. 과거를 두려워 말고 용감하게 맞서봐
|vo_09_05_rm         = Nan gakkeum jinannaldeul-ui naega jonjaehago isseumeul neukkyeo.... Tto na jasinege gidaehaewatdaneun geotdo... neodo ireon neukkimeul badeun jeogi isseul geoya. Geureonikka oneulnare nega jeonhyeo dareun gireul gago itdeorado jeoldae gwageo-ui jasineul bujeonghaji ma. Yejon-ui nega oneul-ui neol mandeun geonikka. Gwageoreul duryeowo malgo yonggamhage matseobwa
|vo_09_05_tl         = I sometimes feel that the past me exists... And that I've been expecting from myself... I'm sure you've felt this way before. So even if you're going a completely different way today, never deny yourself from the past. The past you made who you are today. Don't be afraid of the past and face it bravely.

|vo_10_01_title      = 로자리아의 취미…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 술은 적당히 마시면 기분 좋아져. 가끔 알코올로만 해결되는 근심거리가 있지. 난 절대 취할 일 없겠지만
|vo_10_01_rm         = Sureun jeokdanghi masimyeon gibun joajyeo. Gakkeum alko'olloman haegyeoldoeneun geunsimgeoriga itji. Nan jeoldae chwihal il eopgetjiman
|vo_10_01_tl         = Moderate drinking makes me feel better. Sometimes there's a worry that's solved only by alcohol. I'll never get drunk, though.

|vo_10_02_title      = 로자리아의 고민…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg

|vo_10_02_rm         = Hyu... daeum dal hapchang haengsaen jeongmal nagagi sireunde Biktoriaga jikjeop homyeonghaesseo...
|vo_10_02_tl         = Phew... I really don't want to go to the choir event next month, but Victoria called me herself...

|vo_10_03_tx         = 와인에 조린 짐승고기 먹어봤어? 알코올과 고깃덩어리가 한 접시에 담겨있는 자태라니, 얼마나 근사한지 몰라
|vo_10_03_rm         = Waine jorin jimseunggogi meogeobwasseo? Alko'olgwa gogitdeong'eoriga han jeopsie damgyeoitneun jataerani, eolmana geunsahanji molla
|vo_10_03_tl         = Have you tried wine-boiled animal meat? How wonderful it is to have alcohol and meat in one plate.
